br.com.zalem.ymir.client.android.entity.ui.editor.attribute

Class EnumAttributeEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.zalem.ymir.client.android.entity.ui.editor.AbstractFieldEditor<T>
      • br.com.zalem.ymir.client.android.entity.ui.editor.AbstractHelperFieldEditor<T>

            • br.com.zalem.ymir.client.android.entity.ui.editor.attribute.EnumAttributeEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener

    public final class EnumAttributeEditor
extends AbstractEnumFieldEditor<java.io.Serializable>
    Editor do tipo enumeração para atributos.
    Formata os valores de acordo com um EntityAttributeFormatter.TypedFormatter.
